КазНПУ имени Абая, реализующий образоват: Abai KazNPU, which implements educational programs of higher education, invites you to paid training based on a test interview
Собеседование могут пройти следующие кат: The following categories of citizens can be interviewed:
- граждане Республики Казахстан имеющие: citizens of the Republic of Kazakhstan who have general secondary education, technical and vocational, post-secondary or higher education, who have served military service for two years after completing military service during academic year**
- в профильную магистратуру граждане Рес: citizens of the Republic of Kazakhstan who have served military service in the profile magistracy within three years after completing military service**
*Приказ Министра образования и науки Рес: Order of the Minister of Education and Science of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated 01.04.2019 №134 'Methodological recommendations for compliance of related groups of educational programs of higher education and specialties of technical and vocational, post-secondary education' (Methodological recommendation 134).
**При этом зачисление граждан, осуществл: **Herewith, the enrollment of citizens is carried out in accordance with the academic calendar 5 (five) days before the beginning of the next academic period.

Войти (тест начнётся сразу): Log in (the test will start immediately)

о прохождении претендентом собеседования: of completion of the applicant's interview

в том, что он(она) прошел(а) собеседован: in the fact that he (she) passed(a) interview and received(a) «admission» to submit documents for paid training in the group of educational programs of KazNPU.
